com.vector.cfg.util.scripting.dynamic

Interface IDynamicObject


  • @PublishedApi(value=ADDITIONS_ALLOWED)
 @PublishedApiDomain(value=AUTOMATION_IF)
public interface IDynamicObject
    IDynamicObject provides access to dynamically bound properties and methods. The IDynamicObject APi is used to enrich instance with other instances at runtime. This is especially useful if the instance to enrich is lower in the stack than the element to add.

    (c) Copyright Vctr Informatik GmbH. All Rights Reserved.

    See Also:
    IDynamicObjectAware
